review:
i am or i should say i was not a fan of kangana ranaut but this film has changed that thought. 

shiney ahuja, great actor. 

this film is so good that i am really unable to describe. 
this film is a great tribute to late. parveen babi in the most beautiful way possible. this film has all the elements that make it perfect :
great script
great actors who have beautifully justified their roles
great music 

this film is destined to be perfect because it came right from the heart, each and every piece falls into the right slot and connects. mohit suri has done exceptional job.

#underrated

one of the most underrated bollywood romantic movie i have ever seen, this movie will make you fall in love with the character 'aditya', both the lead actors have done there job extremely well, the feeling of pain in the eyes of aditya for sana is the thing that makes me very emotional every time,at the climax this movie will definitely make you feel the emotion of aditya's character,this movie will definitely show you how to love a person at any situation at any cost. 

i will definitely recommend you this movie for its great direction, screenplay, acting & its great songs.
one of the best movies ever seen....  kangana ranaut played a very great role in this movie... this is actually biography of famous actress of 70s and 80s parveen babi... great work...
